results.title: Double Trouble in the Basement! A Case of PLA2R-Associated Membranous Nephropathy with Atypical Anti-Glomerular Basement Membrane Disease.
results.text_hl: Compared to typical @<m>DISEASE_Anti_Glomerular_Basement_Membrane_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019867 @@@anti-GBM disease@@@, atypical @<m>DISEASE_Anti_Glomerular_Basement_Membrane_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019867 @@@anti-GBM disease@@@ is often seronegative, with a mild disease presentation and course.

citations.NLM: Tolani R, Sathiyaraj S, Lyu D, Truong L, Thurston T, El-Zaatari ZM, Khan AR, Edwards A, Bobart SA. Double Trouble in the Basement! A Case of PLA2R-Associated Membranous Nephropathy with Atypical Anti-Glomerular Basement Membrane Disease. Glomerular Dis. 2025 Jan-Dec;5(1):13-18. PMID: 39991197
